description.ko: 음파가 기하학적 패턴으로 구현되는 과정을 시각적으로 탐구하며, 빛과 유동적인 움직임을 통해 음악의 보이지 않는 에너지를 포착합니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of how sound waves manifest into geometric patterns, capturing the invisible energy of music through light and fluid motion.

prompt: Abstract visualization of sound waves, cymatics patterns, fluid motion of frequencies, luminous neon particles, deep indigo and electric cyan color palette, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution, mathematical beauty of audio, hyper-detailed digital art.
